summary: This node allows you to interact with the Asana REST API to manage tasks, projects, users, and more.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: The type of authentication to use (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The type of resource to interact with (e.g., Project, Task, User).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Create, Get Many).

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent task to operate on.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the subtask to create.

parameters.name: otherProperties
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a subtask.
